Uses of Interface
tree.samplers.ISampler

  • Packages that use ISampler 
    Package Description
    tree.sampler  
    tree  

    • Uses of ISampler in tree.sampler

      Classes in tree.sampler that implement ISampler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sampler_Deterministic
      Super-simple depth-first search with NO random selection.
      class  Sampler_Distribution
      Purely sample according to the assigned distributions, no other heuristics.
      class  Sampler_FixedDepth 
      class  Sampler_Greedy 
      class  Sampler_Random
      Dumb sampler, either for filling a space or testing purposes.
      class  Sampler_UCB
      Implements upper confidence bound for trees (UCBT, UCT, UCB, depending on who you ask).
      Methods in tree.sampler that return ISampler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISampler ISampler.getCopy()
      Copy this sampler and its settings.

    • Uses of ISampler in tree

      Fields in tree declared as ISampler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ISampler TreeStage.sampler
      Currently only supporting one sampler per stage.
      Methods in tree with parameters of type ISampler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TreeWorker.setSampler(ISampler sampler)
      Set which sampler is used.

      Constructor and Description
